completeListOfAbilities.name: Thunderstorm
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
6-hit group 雷水風 ranged BRV attack + group HP attack
Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
Deals extra BRV damage to debuffed targets
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
Self: 2 turns special effect Syldra's Care

Slightly increases amount party's stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV、 triggers Whirlpool (2-hit 水 ranged BRV attack; grants allies BRV based on BRV damage dealt; no Knock Back) after enemy turn while special effect Syldra's Care active (does not stack with special effects of same name)

passives.desc: Marginally raises party's Break Bonus upon inflicting Break

passives.name: Crown's Order
passives.desc: Slightly raises allies' INT BRV、 MAX BRV while own HP is less than 50% of MAX
passives.short_desc: Crown's Order: Raises INT BRV & MAX BRV of allies

passives.name: Debuffed Attack Boost Up
passives.desc: Moderately raises MAX BRV、 ATK while an enemy is debuffed
passives.short_desc: Debuffed Attack Boost Up: Raises MAX BRV、 ATK

passives.name: Waterwhirl Extension
passives.desc:
Waterwhirl use +2

Mastery requirement for Waterwhirl to become Waterwhirl+ reduced by 1

When using Waterwhirl、 Waterwhirl+:
 • Slight BRV damage boost
 • Increased BRV damage dealt to debuffed targets
 • Self: 6 turns The Pirate Way
 • Higher turn rate
 • Triggers additional HP attack after use

When using Waterwhirl:
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%

When using Waterwhirl+:
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%

While The Pirate Way active:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage; deals extra BRV damage to debuffed targets)
passives.short_desc: Waterwhirl Extension: Boost to Waterwhirl

passives.name: All Mastery Boost Speed
passives.desc: Slightly raises party's MAX BRV、 SPD upon ability mastery
passives.short_desc: All Mastery Boost Speed: Raises party's MAX BRV、 SPD

passives.name: Cannonfire Extension
passives.desc:
Cannonfire use +3

When using Cannonfire、 Cannonfire+:
 • Becomes group attack
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 4; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
 • Moderate Poison boost
 • Slight ATK Down、 DEF Down boost
 • Triggers additional group HP attack after use; deals proportionate HP damage to each target

When using Cannonfire:
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%

When using Cannonfire+:
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
passives.short_desc: Cannonfire Extension: Boost to Cannonfire

passives.name: Destruction Brilliance
passives.desc: Slightly raises MAX BRV、 ATK
passives.short_desc: Destruction Brilliance: Raises MAX BRV、 ATK

passives.name: Debuff Attack Up Extension
passives.desc: When using Debuff Attack Up:\n • Adds effect that slightly increases stolen BRV limit
passives.short_desc: Debuff Attack Up Extension: Boost to Debuff Attack Up

passive.name: Debuff Attack Up Growth
passive.desc: Debuff Attack Up use +1\n\nDebuff Attack Up effect duration +2
passive.short_desc: Debuff Attack Up Growth: Boost to Debuff Attack Up

passive.name: Full HP Critical Poison All
passive.desc: Grants effect for 6 turns that reduces enemy's BRV by 30% of individual INT BRV at start of enemy's turn when dealing critical hit while HP at MAX\n*Does not stack with same sphere
passive.short_desc: Full HP Critical Poison All: Effects a certain amount of BRV damage at start of all targets' turns after dealing critical hit

passive.name: Infinite Waters
passive.desc: When using Waterwhirl、 Waterwhirl+:\n • BRV damage boost\n • Enfeeblement Up duration+

passive.name: Leader's Way
passive.desc:
Cannonfire mastery requirement reduced by 1

When using Cannonfire、 Cannonfire+:
 • BRV damage boost
 • Poison、 ATK Down、 DEF Down boost、 hit rate+、 duration+
 • Target: 8 turns MAX BRV Down I

When using Cannonfire+:
 • Removes all buffs from targets

passives.name: Voyage with My Mate Extension Attack Boost Up
passives.desc: While equipping EX+ weapon Air Knife (V)+ or passive ability Voyage with My Mate Extension:\n • Slightly raises MAX BRV、 moderately raises ATK
passives.short_desc: Voyage with My Mate Extension Attack Boost Up: Raises MAX BRV、 ATK

passives.name: Thunderstorm BRV Hit Plus Force Advance++
passives.desc:
When using Thunderstorm:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 9; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Moderately raises limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV

HP Attack+ becomes HP Attack++ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; slightly increased cumulative BRV damage; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%)
passives.short_desc: Thunderstorm BRV Hit Plus Force Advance++: Boost to Thunderstorm; enables HP Attack++
